txt.en: You found a dwarf from the Silvertine Lodes held prisoner in a goblin-camp.
'Hurry up and get me out of here! I wish I had never wanted to come out here. All I wanted to do was make my father proud, and now I am about to become goblin-stew! Stop dawdling and let us go!'
Flík is in the goblin-camp where you found him.\n\nYou should escort Flík to safety.
'So you found Flík? And he was well? Not too badly hurt? That is very relieving news.\n\n'Thank you! I am in your debt. Both the captain's son and my beard are safe, at least for another night.'
Styrr is in the Deep Descent camp.\n\nYou should return at once to Styrr and inform him that Flík has been found and rescued.
'I hate this place... get me back to the Deep Descent!'
'I can make it back to camp from here. Thank you for your help.'
Inform Flík that you are ready to go
Inform Styrr that Flík has been rescued
